The video was first shared in the contex: whose name appears in all widely-shared versions of the video.
The video was taken in Pretoria: South Africa, as evidenced by the presence of the artillery monument in front of the Union Building, which can be verified through Google Street View.
The video was recorded on August 29: 2020, during a rally in Pretoria held to protest against farm murders in South Africa, and it shows the entirety of the prayer held that day in Afrikaans and English at the South Africa Heavy National Artillery Memorial.
